name: Attribute Battle (Rule Card)
text:
RULES:
? Monster Attributes have Strengths and Weaknesses. If a monster attacks an Attribute that it is Strong against, its original ATK is doubled, but if it is Weak to that Attribute, its original ATK is halved.
? FIRE: Strong against EARTH, Weak to WATER.
? WATER: Strong against FIRE, Weak to WIND.
? WIND: Strong against WATER, Weak to EARTH.
? EARTH: Strong against WIND, Weak to FIRE.
? LIGHT: Strong against DARK.
? DARK: Strong against LIGHT.
